books.name: It
books.description: A horror novel by American writer Stephen King, first published in 1986 by Viking Press. The work touches on important topics for King: the power of memory, the strength of the united group, the impact of childhood trauma on adulthood.

books.name: War and peace
books.description: An epic novel by Leo Nikolaevich Tolstoy, describing Russian society in the era of wars against Napoleon in 1805-1812. The epilogue of the novel brings the story to 1820.
